title: [LFT] Plat mid laner looking to join a competitive team
body:
I'm looking to join a competitive team for tournaments and flex

I'm currently Plat 3 in both solo queue and flex.
I can play pretty much anyone in mid depending on the situation, and of course willing to learn new champs if the need arises
I own all champs for swaps with other team members if im required to (i'de be concerned if this was never the case)

I also have a little bit of experience with shot calling and drafting, but if i was given either of these roles i would need to work on improvement.

I'm currently at uni, so i'll have to play around that schedule to some degree, but I'm willing to put in at least a few hours most days to practice with the team.

If you have any other questions or would like to give me a trial, please add me in game.

Regards,
Zami

replies.body:
Hi Zami
I'm also looking to join (or to create) a competitive team for tournaments/flex.

I own 130 champions.

I'm plat 5 currently, with my peak being plat 2. I consider myself higher skill level than plat 5. I main jungle: kha'zix, fiddlestick. Shaco is my tertiary jungler. My secondary role is mid which I only play fizz.

 I'm also willing to learn new champs if the need arises.

Do you have a team yet? If not would you like to make one with me?
